post:
Hi guys! We just restocked a new server in LA. So thought it would be good to do some good deals on our current Windows VPS lineup!

##Some rules:
- Discount only applies to US-CA-2G package, if you want to upgrade to higher ones, it will no longer be applied.
- Limited quantity: 50 (Increased from last time :D).
- Offers are available until **27th May** or **while stocks last**

##Features:
- All price already had both Windows 2012 R2 and 2016 License **included**.
- **Hyper-V** based virtualization: boost the performance of your Windows VPS by 20-30% compared with KVM.
- Powered by **enterprise NVMe** (ReFS + RAID 1).
- Nightly backup is available for free of charge (not available for requests).
- Locations: **Los Angeles, California, US** (Quadranet).
- Accepting Paypal, Cryptocurrency, Perfect money.

##OFFERS:

<pre>
1 vCore (50% dedicated)
2 GB RAM
25 GB NVMe
Unmetered Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps
1 Dedicated IP
Licensed Windows 2012 R2 - 2016
</pre>
**Monthly:** $5
**Order link:**  https://billing.hyonix.com/order/config/index/vps/?group_id=14&pricing_id=96 (Coupon: NVME5)


##Test IP:
- Los Angeles, California, US (Quadranet).: 185.244.38.254


##More:
- About us: https://hyonix.com/about-us
- Terms of services: https://hyonix.com/tos
- Acceptable Usage Policy (AUP): https://hyonix.com/aup
- Privacy Policy: https://hyonix.com/privacy

Feel free to ask us any question via LET PMs, Live Chat, [Ticket](https://billing.hyonix.com/client/plugin/support_manager/client_tickets/add/4/)
